main event: A military observer reported sighting a circular-shaped bright object descending through a twisting course over Klamath Falls, Oregon.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 2 seconds and had a small trail.
The description is consistent with that of a meteor.
The weather was clear with visible stars at the time of the sighting.
There were no known objects in the area that could explain the sighting.
The staff intelligence officer concluded the sighting was likely a natural phenomenon or departing space debris.
